document_data.name: Ziggurat of Eternal Victory
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ziggurat of Eternal Victory''' was a massive pyramid temple dedicated to [[Gilgeam]], the Supreme Ruler of [[Unther]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the [[Unthalass/Palace District|Palace District]] of the capital city of [[Unthalass]].
document_data.Description: The Ziggurat of Eternal Victory a step pyramid with sixteen tiers. The entire surface of the pyramid was covered in [[gold]], [[bronze]], and other metals and the top was crowned with blue brickwork. The temple stood {{SI|800|ft|long=yes}} tall, making it one of the largest man-made structures throughout [[Faerûn]].
document_data.History: Much of the Ziggurat of Eternal Victory was sacked and burned following Gilgeam's death in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
